# [Second Thought](https://link.zhubai.love/api/link?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.decohack.com%2Fgo%3F_%3D7cb20697cfaHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuc2Vjb25kdGhvdWdodC5hcHAvam91cm5hbA%3D%3D&post_id=2123360734586441728&subscriber_id=2114063136197623808&token=65f748e4a48821e85a61f0cc49c92570&timestamp=1649223199865&signature=794b986e665fa8e3244d6c0250f337e1943322df7eeb730ca3aa1e7d8a1ee8f7) 一个写焦虑日记的网站。追踪你的担忧，发现你自己不好的想法。界面很好看，配色很舒服。

![](https://ci5.googleusercontent.com/proxy/XWpHIXpDooSeov3-yjwgC7eRAY-GxozTISNMu-QPXwxLhh4ceWAlVsPtRVH1jJUssMeTlVQ2o9pNLV_6ExlgOs-MDk-GZnbPOIMd4HJkFg8=s0-d-e1-ft#https://imgs.zhubai.love/a042d1f56c2548ec95b0ddac6c30bc9b.png)
